name: Pinnochio Adventure
description:
A to go left

D to go right

Space to jump and go to next dialog

Left mouse button to attack
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Pinocchio needs to escape from Geppetto and to find a goal in life after this traumatic experience, help him!

It's my first game I know that there are few buggs like when you jump from hight places sometimes it get stuck, but normally it can be fixed moving he character or attacking.

By the way it doesn't attack with a mucus, is the leaf (I must practice my 8bit art)
